question: Madhu Shetye, who passed away recently, was the founding member of which press club?
explanation: Madhu Shetye (89), the senior journalist and activist, has passed away in Mumbai on 27th November 2019. He was a founding member of the Mumbai Press Club (MPC). He was a former corporator in the Mumbai municipal corporation and had participated in the Samyukta Maharashtra and Goa liberation movements.
